languages.text:
The Rogue Trader and two random allies start combat with temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(their own {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower -//
languages.original_text:
Вольный Торговец и два случайных союзника начинают бой с временным {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровьем{/g}, равным <u>(их {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — последователь -//

traits.locale_text:
The Rogue Trader and their two random allies start combat with temporary wounds equal to <u>(their own resolve)</u>.{br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Follower -//

{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und zwei zufällige Verbündete beginnen den Kampf mit temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe <u>(der jeweiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Jünger -//

The Rogue Trader and two random allies start combat with temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(their own {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u>.{br}

Der Freihändler und zwei zufällige Verbündete beginnen den Kampf mit temporären Wunden in Höhe von <u>(ihrer eigenen Entschlossenheit)</u>.{br}
///Benevolentia – Jünger -//

languages.text:
{mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et deux alliés aléatoires commencent le combat avec un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal à <u>(sa propre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Serviteur -//
languages.original_text:
The Rogue Trader and two random allies start combat with temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(their own {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u>.{br}

{mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et deux alliés aléatoires commencent le combat avec un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal à <u>(sa propre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Serviteur -//

languages.text:
行商浪人与两名随机盟友在战斗开始时获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（目标自身{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）</u>。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——追随者 -//
languages.original_text:

行商浪人与两名随机盟友在战斗开始时获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（目标自身{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）</u>。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——追随者 -//

languages.text:
{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y dos aliados aleatorios empiezan el combate con {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales iguales a <u>(su respectiva {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Seguidor -//

{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y dos aliados aleatorios empiezan el combate con heridas temporales iguales a <u>(su respectiva firmeza)</u>.{br}
///Benevolentia: Seguidor//

languages.text:
ローグトレーダーとランダムな味方2人は、<u>(自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g})</u>に等しい一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を持った状態で戦闘を開始する。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 信者-//
languages.original_text:
The Rogue Trader and two random allies start combat with temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(their own {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower -//

ローグトレーダーとランダムな味方2人は、<u>(自身の決断力)</u>に等しい一時体力を持った状態で戦闘を開始する。{br}
///ベネボレンティア ― 信者-//

languages.text:
Hür Tacir ve rastgele iki dost birimi, çatışmaya <u>(kendi {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerleri)</u> kadar geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı ile başlarlar.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Takipçi -//
